title: I have to redownload my game?
body: So I just played a game where I took forever to load and got extreme lag. But we remarked that, because a teammate dcd. My game then froze at the defeat screen and I turned off my computer and turned it back on - i got a windows troubleshoot bug. Then I turned my computer off again, and back on, then it was back to normal. I launched league and I had to redownload the entire game, and I still have extreme lag.
